title: Lawyers for jailed Reuters reporters argue no evidence of crime
text:
Lawyers for jailed Reuters reporters argue no evidence of crime 3:36am IST - 01:37 
Lawyers for two Reuters reporters jailed in Myanmar asked a judge on Wednesday to dismiss the case against them, arguing there was insufficient evidence to support charges of obtaining secret government papers.   
Lawyers for two Reuters reporters jailed in Myanmar asked a judge on Wednesday to dismiss the case against them, arguing there was insufficient evidence to support charges of obtaining secret government papers.  //reut.rs/2q6sXNH
